backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, templates, bio pages, subscriptions, and OTP storage with supporting helper functions and system templates.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new activeOtps map to the actor’s state with a default empty initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping OTP-related frontend changes to corresponding files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions including light/dark mode color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router and layout setup with authentication and registration guards plus route definitions.
frontend/src/components/BioFormulaHelper: UI helper component offering an expandable bio-writing guide and an insertable starter template.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Top navigation header handling authentication, user profile state, and links including conditional Pro features and Canva shortcut.
frontend/src/components/LinksEditor.tsx: Interactive editor for adding, removing, and updating link items within a card UI.
frontend/src/components/PaymentQrUploade: Uploads and previews a payment QR image with progress tracking and removal support.
frontend/src/components/PhoneOtpGate.tsx: Phone verification flow handling OTP generation, submission, and success state.
frontend/src/components/SocialHandlesEdi: Editor for managing social handle entries including platform selection and field updates.
frontend/src/components/TemplateBadge.ts: Renders a styled badge label for template attributes like trending or most-used.
frontend/src/components/TemplateCard.tsx: Displays a template preview card with badge, details, and navigation to the template page.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Exports a list of predefined template category strings and its type.
frontend/src/constants/platformCopy.ts: Holds shared copy strings for system prompts and About Us content.
frontend/src/constants/subscriptionBenef: Defines premium and pro subscription benefits and provides helper functions to retrieve benefit lists for each tier.
frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts: Provides curated seed templates with encoded content and metadata for use when backend templates are unavailable.
frontend/src/data/topInfluencers.ts: Exports a list of top influencers with Instagram handles grouped by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and provider context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for profiles, OTP flows, templates, and phone verification.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dark mode, typography, and screenshot‑protection rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About Us page showing platform description text and key feature highlights. Uses styled sections and imported ABOUT_US_TEXT.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements subscription checkout flow with UPI payments, payment reference confirmation, and mutation to activate subscriptions. Handles multiple payment methods, errors, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing landing page with hero content and CTA buttons. Redirects logged‑in users to templates and triggers login when starting.
frontend/src/pages/PhoneVerificationPage: Shows a phone OTP verification gate and redirects to signup once verified. Wraps the PhoneOtpGate component with simple navigation logic.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows Premium and Pro subscription plans with feature lists and gating messages. Allows navigating to checkout with the selected tier.
frontend/src/pages/SharedBioPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a shared bio page with title, text, social handles, and links. Handles loading and missing-page states with fallback UI.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Manages two-step signup: phone verification and profile creation. Submits user details to registration and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.ts: Displays details for a selected template, handles bio generation, copying, and screenshot prevention logic.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateEditorPage.ts: Provides an editor for customizing template content, parsing editable data, and creating shareable bio pages.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Shows all templates with category filtering, badges, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTemplatePage.ts: Allows Pro users to upload new templates with metadata, category, and thumbnail handling.
frontend/src/utils/bioAssistant.ts: Generates rule‑based bio suggestions using prompt keywords and template categories.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Provides UPI link generation, payment app deep‑link handling, and clipboard utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (query/hash), persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve them with precedence, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, animations, typography, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, known issues, and generated assets for a subscription-based Liinks platform.
